text:
@Yamiche @realDonaldTrump REALLY? Your golfing has cost more than what it would take to bury the dead.

"As the U.S. death toll . . . mounts, President Donald Trump has yet to free up a pool of disaster relief funding . . .  to help families cover burial costs." https://t.co/tfY6a318hF
